Dear Mr. Curry:
This will acknowledge your letter of April 3 favoring
the inclusion of radio broadcasting in the proposed
Public Television Act of 1967.
I am taking the liberty of forwarding a copy of your
letter and the enclosure to the Senate Commerce
Committee which will begin hearings on the legislation
April 11. Though not a member of the Committee,
I will keep a close eye on forthcoming proceedings.
Thank you for bringing your suggestions to my
attention.
